mapper.delete: delete tbl_social where USER_FOLLOWING_ID = #{userFollowingId} and USER_FOLLOWER_ID=#{userFollowerId}
mapper.select: select user_following_id from tbl_social where user_following_id = #{userFollowingId} and user_follower_id =#{userFollowerId}
mapper.sql: select wr.review_num,wr.wine_num,wr.user_num, u.user_Realname, wr.review_date,wr.review_content,w.wine_ImageName, w.wine_title,wr.review_rating, u.user_NickName from tbl_wine_review wr, tbl_social s, tbl_user u, tbl_wine_test w where wr.user_num= s.user_following_id and wr.user_num=u.user_num and wr.wine_num = w.wine_num and s.user_follower_id=#{userNum} group by wr.review_num,wr.user_num,u.user_Realname, wr.review_date,wr.review_content ,wr.wine_num,w.wine_ImageName,w.wine_title,wr.review_rating,u.user_NickName order by to_date ( wr.review_date , ' Mon DD , YYYY ' , 'NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = AMERICAN') desc

select wr.review_num,wr.wine_num,wr.user_num, u.user_Realname, wr.review_date,wr.review_content,w.wine_ImageName, w.wine_title, wr.review_rating, u.user_NickName from tbl_wine_review wr, tbl_user u, tbl_wine_test w where wr.user_num=u.user_num and wr.wine_num = w.wine_num and u.user_num= #{user_num} group by wr.review_num,wr.user_num,u.user_Realname, wr.review_date,wr.review_content ,wr.wine_num,w.wine_ImageName,w.wine_title,wr.review_rating,, u.user_NickName order by to_date ( wr.review_date , ' Mon DD , YYYY ' , 'NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = AMERICAN') desc
